Question: One reviewer in the Toronto Star raved that this person was "a genuine star coming to life".
Hints: Unfortunately, this person's impersonations bombed and this gave him doubts about his capability as a professional entertainer.
This person announced via his Twitter account on February 27, 2010, that his daughter had given birth to her first child, a boy.
This person is self-publishing the book, which will be released in September 2013.
